title: people make fun of me for being gold 4.......
body:
but when i look them up, they don't even make it past bronze 3.  some of them aren't even ranked lmfao.   what kind of sense does that fuckin make?     


lmao bruh! XD


im just saying, i never make fun of someone for being in their current tier.  but for fuck sakes.  if you're going to make fun of someone, AT LEAST out rank them.  salty bronze nubs.  


"omfg you're gold lolol such nub,  stay in gold"

...i look them up, lvll 29 lmfao ggggg
